projectDesc.p: The Göttingen Register of Electronic Texts in Indian Languages (GRETIL) is a resource platform providing standardized machine-readable texts in Indian languages that have been contributed by various individuals and institutions.

correction.p: Apparent errors have been silently corrected.

normalization.p: GRETIL normalizes all texts contributed consistently for each language. Sanskrit texts are normalized in accordance with the scheme of the International Alphabet of Sanskrit Transliteration (IAST) in order to facilitate word search across its corpus without additional transformations.

All characters that were fully equivalent to an IAST-conformant character in the text file contributed have been made to conform to the character list below. Non-conformant characters with additional information including accents, capitalization, and whitespace have been preserved as orig elements inside choice elements with their IAST-conformant equivalent in reg elements for the creation of a plain text. These additional informations will be available only in those transformations of this file that display the original information.

quotation.p: If indicated unambiguously in the text file contributed quotation marks have been replaced with the q element and, in case a reference was provided, have been nested inside a cit with the respective reference provided in a ref element after the quote.

segmentation.p: Unnumbered div elements are used to structure the text, using the type and n attributes in accordance with the refsDecl.

interpretation.p:
Interpretive markup which is visible only in analytic transformations of this file consists of:
Highlighting in hi elements,
Corruptions in sic elements,
Remarks in note elements with the @resp attribute identifying the agency.

note.p: rājā -- bhagavān kāśyapaḥ śāśvate brahmaṇi sthita iti prakāśaḥ / iyaṃ ca vaḥ sakhī tad ātmaja īti katham etat /

div.p: anasūyā śṛṇotv āryaḥ / asti ko 'pi kauśika iti gotranāmadheyo mahāprabhāvo rājarṣiḥ /

note.p: anasūyā -- śṛṇotv āryaḥ / asti ko 'pi kauśika iti gotra-nāma-dheyo mahā-prabhāvo rājarṣiḥ /

div.p: rājā asti / śrūyate /

note.p: rājā -- asti / śrūyate /

div.p: ana tam āvayoḥ priyasakhyāḥ prabhavam avagaccha / ujjhitāyāḥ śarīrasaṃvardhanādibhis tātakāśyapo 'syāḥ pitā /

note.p: ana -- tam āvayoḥ priya-sakhyāḥ prabhavam avagaccha / ujjhitāyāḥ śarīra-saṃvardhana-ādibhis tāta-kāśyapo 'syāḥ pitā /

div.p: rājā ujjhitaśabdena janitaṃ me kautūhalam / āmūlāt+śrotum icchāmi /

note.p: rājā -- ujjhita-śabdena janitaṃ me kautūhalam / ā-mūlāt+śrotum icchāmi /

div.p: ana śṛṇotv āryaḥ / gautamītīre purā kila tasya rājarṣer ugre tapasi vartamānasya kim api jātaśaṅkair devair menakā nāmāpsarāḥ preṣitā niyamavighnakāriṇī /

note.p: ana -- śṛṇotv āryaḥ / gautamī-tīre purā kila tasya rājarṣer ugre tapasi vartamānasya kim api jāta-śaṅkair devair menakā nāma-apsarāḥ preṣitā niyama-vighna-kāriṇī /

div.p: rājā asty etad anyasamādhibhīrutvaṃ devānām /

note.p: rājā -- asty etad anya-samādhi-bhīrutvaṃ devānām /

bhūyiṣṭham anyaviṣayā na tu dṛṣṭir asyāḥ //

div.head: dvitīyo 'ṅkaḥ
div.p: (tataha praviśati viṣaṇṇo vidūṣakaḥ)

note.p: (tataha praviśati viṣaṇṇo vidūṣakaḥ)

div.p: vidūṣaka (niḥśvasya) bho disṭam / etasya mṛgayāśīlasya rājño vayasyabhāvena nirviṇṇo 'smi / ayaṃ mṛgo 'yaṃ vahāro 'yaṃ śārdūla iti madhyāhne 'pi grīṣmaviralapādapachāyāsu vanarājiṣv āhiṇḍayate aṭatīto 'ṭavī / patrasaṃkarakaṣāyāṇi kaduṣṇāni girinadījalāni pīyante / aniyatavelaṃ śūlyamāṃsabhūyiṣṭha āhāro bhujyate / turagānudhāvanakaṇḍitasaṃdhe rātrāv api nikāmaṃ śayitavyaṃ nāsti / tato mahaty eva pratyūṣe dāsyāḥ putraiḥ śakunilubdhakair vanagrahaṇakolāhalena pratibodhito 'smi / iyatedānīm api pīḍā na kiṣkrāmati / tato gaṇḍasyopari piṇḍakaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ / hyaḥ kilāsmāsv avahīneṣu tatra bhavato mṛgānusāreṇāśramapadaṃ praviṣṭasya tāpasakanyakā śakuntalā mamādhanyatayā darśitā / sāṃprataṃ nagaragamanāya manaḥ katham api na karoti / adya api tasya tām eva cintayato 'kṣṇoḥ prabhātam āsīt / kā gatiḥ / yāvat taṃ kṛtācāraparikramaṃ paśyāmi / (iti parikramyāvalokya ca)

note.p: vidūṣaka -- (niḥśvasya) bho disṭam / etasya mṛgayā-śīlasya rājño vayasya-bhāvena nirviṇṇo 'smi / ayaṃ mṛgo 'yaṃ vahāro 'yaṃ śārdūla iti madhya-ahne 'pi grīṣma-virala-pādapa-chāyāsu vana-rājiṣv āhiṇḍayate aṭatīto 'ṭavī / patra-saṃkara-kaṣāyāṇi kaduṣṇāni giri-nadī-jalāni pīyante / aniyata-velaṃ śūlya-māṃsa-bhūyiṣṭha āhāro bhujyate / turaga-anudhāvana-kaṇḍita-saṃdhe rātrāv api nikāmaṃ śayitavyaṃ na asti / tato mahaty eva pratyūṣe dāsyāḥ putraiḥ śakuni-lubdhakair vana-grahaṇa-kolāhalena pratibodhito 'smi / iyata īdānīm api pīḍā na kiṣkrāmati / tato gaṇḍasya upari piṇḍakaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ / hyaḥ kila asmāsv avahīneṣu tatra bhavato mṛga-anusāreṇā aśrama-padaṃ praviṣṭasya tāpasa-kanyakā śakuntalā mama adhanyatayā darśitā / sāṃprataṃ nagara-gamanāya manaḥ katham api na karoti / adya api tasya tām eva cintayato 'kṣṇoḥ prabhātam āsīt / kā gatiḥ / yāvat taṃ kṛta-ācāra-parikramaṃ paśyāmi / (iti parikramya avalokya ca)

div.p: eṣa bāṇāsanahastābhir yavanībhir vanapuṣpamālādhāriṇībhiḥ parivṛta ita evāgachati priyavayasyaḥ / bhavatu / aṅgabhaṅgavikala iva bhūtvā sthāsyāmi / yady evam api nāma viśramaṃ labheya / (iti daṇḍakāṣṭham avalambya sthitaḥ) (tataḥ praviśati yathānirdiṣṭaparivāro rājā)

note.p: eṣa bāṇa-āsana-hastābhir yavanībhir vana-puṣpa-mālā-dhāriṇībhiḥ parivṛta ita evā agachati priya-vayasyaḥ / bhavatu / aṅga-bhaṅga-vikala iva bhūtvā sthāsyāmi / yady evam api nāma viśramaṃ labheya / (iti daṇḍa-kāṣṭham avalambya sthitaḥ) (tataḥ praviśati yathā-nirdiṣṭa-parivāro rājā)

div.p: rājā

note.p: rājā --

lg.l: kāmaṃ priyā na sulabhā manas tu tadbhāvadarśanāśvāsi /
akṛtārthe 'pi manasije ratim ubhayaprārthanā kurute //
kāmaṃ priyā na sulabhā manas tu tad-bhāva-darśana-āśvāsi /
akṛta-arthe 'pi manasije ratim ubhaya-prārthanā kurute //

div.p: (smitaṃ kṛtvā) evam ātmābhiprāyasaṃbhāviteṣṭajanacittavṛttiḥ prārthitā viḍambyate /

note.p: (smitaṃ kṛtvā) evam ātma-abhiprāya-saṃbhāvita-iṣṭa-jana-citta-vṛttiḥ prārthitā viḍambyate /

lg.l:
snigdhaṃ vīkṣitam anyato 'pi nayane yat prerayantyā tayā
yātaṃ yac ca nitambayor gurutayā mandaṃ vilāsād iva /

mā gā ity uparuddhayā yad api sā sāsūyam uktā sakhī
sarvaṃ tat kila matparāyaṇam aho kāmī svatāṃ paśyati //

snigdhaṃ vīkṣitam anyato 'pi nayane yat prerayantyā tayā
yātaṃ yac ca nitambayor gurutayā mandaṃ vilāsād iva /

mā gā ity uparuddhayā yad api sā sāsūyam uktā sakhī
sarvaṃ tat kila mat-parāyaṇam aho kāmī svatāṃ paśyati //

div.p: vidūṣaka (tathāsthita eva) bho vayasya na me hastapādaṃ prasarati tad vān mātreṇa jāpayiṣyāmi / jayatu jayatu bhavān /

note.p: vidūṣaka -- (tathā-sthita eva) bho vayasya na me hasta-pādaṃ prasarati tad vān mātreṇa jāpayiṣyāmi / jayatu jayatu bhavān /

div.p: rājā kuto 'yaṃ gātropaghātaḥ /

note.p: rājā -- kuto 'yaṃ gātra-upaghātaḥ /

div.p: vidu kutaḥ kila svayam akṣyākulīkṛtyāśrukāraṇaṃ pṛcchasi /

note.p: vidu -- kutaḥ kila svayam akṣy-ākulī-kṛtya-aśru-kāraṇaṃ pṛcchasi /

div.p: rā na khalv avagacchāmi /

note.p: rā -- na khalv avagacchāmi /

div.p: vidu bho vayasya yad vetasaḥ kubjalīlāṃ viḍambayati tat kim ātmanaḥ prabhāveṇa nanu nadīvegasya /

note.p: vidu -- bho vayasya yad vetasaḥ kubja-līlāṃ viḍambayati tat kim ātmanaḥ prabhāveṇa nanu nadī-vegasya /

div.p: rā nadīvegas tatra kāraṇam /

note.p: rā -- nadī-vegas tatra kāraṇam /

div.p: vidu mama api bhavān /

note.p: vidu -- mama api bhavān /

div.p: rā katham iva /

note.p: rā -- katham iva /

div.p: vidu evaṃ rājakāryāṇy ujjhitvaitādṛśa ākulapradeśe vanacaravṛttinā tvayā bhavitavyam / yat satyaṃ pratyahaṃ śvāpadasamutsāraṇaiḥ saṃkṣobhitasaṃdhibandhānāṃ mama gātrāṇām anīśo 'smi saṃvṛttaḥ / tat prasīda me / ekāham api tāvad viśramyatām /

note.p: vidu -- evaṃ rāja-kāryāṇy ujjhitva aitādṛśa ākula-pradeśe vana-cara-vṛttinā tvayā bhavitavyam / yat satyaṃ pratyahaṃ śvā-pada-samutsāraṇaiḥ saṃkṣobhita-saṃdhi-bandhānāṃ mama gātrāṇām anīśo 'smi saṃvṛttaḥ / tat prasīda me / eka āham api tāvad viśramyatām /

div.p: rājā (svagatam) ayaṃ caivam āha / mama api kāśyapasutām anusmṛtya mṛgayāviklavaṃ cetaḥ / kutaḥ

note.p: rājā -- (svagatam) ayaṃ ca evam āha / mama api kāśyapa-sutām anusmṛtya mṛgayā-viklavaṃ cetaḥ / kutaḥ

lg.l: na namayitum adhijyam asmi śakto dhanur idam āhitasāyakaṃ mṛgeṣu /
sahavasatim upetya yaiḥ priyāyāḥ kṛta iva mugdhavilokopadeśaḥ //
na namayitum adhijyam asmi śakto dhanur idam āhita-sāyakaṃ mṛgeṣu /
saha-vasatim upetya yaiḥ priyāyāḥ kṛta iva mugdha-viloka-upadeśaḥ //

div.p: vidu (rājño mukhaṃ vilokya) atrabhavān kim api hṛdaye kṛtvā mantrayate / araṇye mayā ruditam āsīt /

note.p: vidu -- (rājño mukhaṃ vilokya) atra-bhavān kim api hṛdaye kṛtvā mantrayate / araṇye mayā ruditam āsīt /

div.p: rā (sasmitam) kim anyat / anatikramaṇīyaṃ me suhṛdvākyam iti sthito 'smi /

note.p: rā -- (sasmitam) kim anyat / anatikramaṇīyaṃ me suhṛd-vākyam iti sthito 'smi /

div.p: vidu ciraṃ jīva / (iti gantum ichati)

note.p: vidu -- ciraṃ jīva / (iti gantum ichati)

div.p: rā vayasya tiṣṭha / sāvaśeṣaṃ me vacaḥ /

note.p: rā -- vayasya tiṣṭha / sāvaśeṣaṃ me vacaḥ /

div.p: vidu ājñāpayatu bhavān /

note.p: vidu -- ājñāpayatu bhavān /

div.p: rā viśrāntena bhavatā mama apy ekasminn anāyāse karmaṇi sahāyena bhavitavyam /

note.p: rā -- viśrāntena bhavatā mama apy ekasminn anāyāse karmaṇi sahāyena bhavitavyam /

div.p: vidu kiṃ modakakhādikāyām / tena hy ayaṃ sugṛhītaḥ kṣaṇaḥ /

note.p: vidu -- kiṃ modaka-khādikāyām / tena hy ayaṃ sugṛhītaḥ kṣaṇaḥ /

div.p: rā yatra vakṣyāmi / kaḥ ko 'tra bhoḥ /

note.p: rā -- yatra vakṣyāmi / kaḥ ko 'tra bhoḥ /

div.p: (praviśya)

note.p: (praviśya)

div.p: dauvārika (praṇamya) ājñāpayatu bharttā /

note.p: dauvārika -- (praṇamya) ājñāpayatu bharttā /

div.p: rā raivataka senāpatis tāvad āhūyatām /

note.p: rā -- raivataka senā-patis tāvad āhūyatām /

div.p: dau tathā / (iti niṣkramya senāpatinā saha punaḥ praviśya) eṣa ājñāvacanotkaṇṭho bhartetodattadṛṣṭir eva tiṣṭhati / upasarpatv āryaḥ /

note.p: dau -- tathā / (iti niṣkramya senā-patinā saha punaḥ praviśya) eṣa ājñā-vacana-utkaṇṭho bharta īto-datta-dṛṣṭir eva tiṣṭhati / upasarpatv āryaḥ /

div.p: seenā (rājānam avalokya) dṛṣṭadoṣā api svāmini mṛgayā kevalaṃ guṇa eva saṃvṛttā / tathā hi devaḥ

note.p: seenā -- (rājānam avalokya) dṛṣṭa-doṣā api svāmini mṛgayā kevalaṃ guṇa eva saṃvṛttā / tathā hi devaḥ

lg.l: anavaratadhanur jyāsphālanakrūrapūrva ravikiraṇasahiṣṇu svedaleśair abhinam /
apacitam api gātraṃ vyāyatatvād alakṣyaṃ giricara iva nāgaḥ prāṇasāraṃ bibharti //
anavarata-dhanur jyā-āsphālana-krūra-pūrva ravi-kiraṇa-sahiṣṇu sveda-leśair abhinam /
apacitam api gātraṃ vyāyatatvād alakṣyaṃ giri-cara iva nāgaḥ prāṇa-sāraṃ bibharti //

div.p: (upetya) jayatu jayatu svāmī / gṛhītaśvāpadam araṇyam / kim anyatrāvasthīyate /

note.p: (upetya) jayatu jayatu svāmī / gṛhīta-śvā-padam araṇyam / kim anyatra-avasthīyate /

div.p: rājā mandotsāhaḥ kṛto 'smi mṛgayāpavādinā mādhavyena /

note.p: rājā -- manda-utsāhaḥ kṛto 'smi mṛgayā-apavādinā mādhavyena /

div.p: senāpati (janāntikam) sakhe sthirapratibandho bhava / ahaṃ tāvat svāminaś cittavṛttim anuvartiṣye / (prakāśam) pralapatv eṣa vaidheyaḥ / nanu prabhur eva nidarśanam /

note.p: senāpati -- (janāntikam) sakhe sthira-pratibandho bhava / ahaṃ tāvat svāminaś citta-vṛttim anuvartiṣye / (prakāśam) pralapatv eṣa vaidheyaḥ / nanu prabhur eva nidarśanam /

lg.l:
medaśchedakṛśodaraṃ laghu bhavaty utthānayogyaṃ vapuḥ
sattvānām api lakṣyate vikṛtimac cittaṃ bhayakrodhayoḥ /

utkarṣaḥ sa ca dhanvināṃ yad iṣavaḥ sidhyanti lakṣye cale
mithyā eva vyasanaṃ vadanti mṛgayām īdṛg vinodaḥ kutaḥ //

medaś-cheda-kṛśa-udaraṃ laghu bhavaty utthāna-yogyaṃ vapuḥ
sattvānām api lakṣyate vikṛtimac cittaṃ bhaya-krodhayoḥ /

utkarṣaḥ sa ca dhanvināṃ yad iṣavaḥ sidhyanti lakṣye cale
mithyā eva vyasanaṃ vadanti mṛgayām īdṛg vinodaḥ kutaḥ //

div.p: vidu apehi re utsāhahetuka / atrabhavān prakṛtim āpannaḥ / tvaṃ tāvad aṭavīto 'ṭavīm āhiṇḍamāno naranāsikālolupasya jīrṇaṛkṣasya kasya api mukhe patiṣyasi /

note.p: vidu -- apehi re utsāha-hetuka / atra-bhavān prakṛtim āpannaḥ / tvaṃ tāvad aṭavīto 'ṭavīm āhiṇḍamāno nara-nāsikā-lolupasya jīrṇa-ṛkṣasya kasya api mukhe patiṣyasi /

div.p: rā bhadra senāpate āśramasaṃnikṛṣṭe sthitāḥ smaḥ / atas te vaco nābhinandāmi / adya tāvat /

note.p: rā -- bhadra senā-pate āśrama-saṃnikṛṣṭe sthitāḥ smaḥ / atas te vaco na abhinandāmi / adya tāvat /

lg.l:
gāhantāṃ mahiṣā nipānasalilaṃ śṛṅgair muhus tāḍitam
chāyābaddhakadambakaṃ mṛgakulaṃ romantham abhyasyatu /

viśrabdhaṃ kriyatāṃ vahāratatibhir mustākṣatiḥ palvale
viśrāmaṃ labhatām idaṃ ca śithitalajyābandham asmaddhanuḥ //

gāhantāṃ mahiṣā nipāna-salilaṃ śṛṅgair muhus tāḍitam
chāyā-baddha-kadambakaṃ mṛga-kulaṃ romantham abhyasyatu /

viśrabdhaṃ kriyatāṃ vahāra-tatibhir mustā-kṣatiḥ palvale
viśrāmaṃ labhatām idaṃ ca śithitala-jyā-bandham asmad-dhanuḥ //

div.p: senāpati yat prabhaviṣṇave rocate /

note.p: senāpati -- yat prabhaviṣṇave rocate /

div.p: rā tena hi nivartaya pūrvagatān vanagrāhiṇaḥ / yathā na me sainikās tapovanam uparundhanti tathā niṣeddhavyāḥ / paśya /

note.p: rā -- tena hi nivartaya pūrva-gatān vana-grāhiṇaḥ / yathā na me sainikās tapo-vanam uparundhanti tathā niṣeddhavyāḥ / paśya /

lg.l: śamapradhāneṣu tapodhaneṣu gūḍhaṃ hi dātātmakam asti tejaḥ /
sparśānukūleva sūryakāntās tadanyatejo 'bhibhavād vamanti //
śama-pradhāneṣu tapo-dhaneṣu gūḍhaṃ hi dāta-ātmakam asti tejaḥ /
sparśa-anukūla īva sūrya-kāntās tad-anya-tejo 'bhibhavād vamanti //

div.p: senā yad ājñāpayati svāmī /

note.p: senā -- yad ājñāpayati svāmī /

div.p: vidu vidhvaṃsatāṃ te utsāhavṛttāntaḥ /

note.p: vidu -- vidhvaṃsatāṃ te utsāha-vṛtta-antaḥ /

div.p: (niṣkrāntaḥ senāpatiḥ)

note.p: (niṣkrāntaḥ senā-patiḥ)

div.p: rājā (parijanaṃ vilokya) apanayantu bhavatyo mṛgayāveśam / raivataka tvam api svaṃ niyogam aśūnyaṃ kuru /

note.p: rājā -- (parijanaṃ vilokya) apanayantu bhavatyo mṛgayā-veśam / raivataka tvam api svaṃ niyogam aśūnyaṃ kuru /

div.p: parijana yad deva ājñāpayati / (iti niṣkrāntaḥ)

note.p: parijana -- yad deva ājñāpayati / (iti niṣkrāntaḥ)

div.p: vidu kṛtaṃ bhavatā nirmakṣikam / sāṃpratam etasmin pādapachāyāviracitavitānasanāthe śilātale niṣīdatu bhavān yāvad aham api sukhāsīno bhavāmi /

note.p: vidu -- kṛtaṃ bhavatā nirmakṣikam / sāṃpratam etasmin pādapa-chāyā-viracita-vitāna-sanāthe śilā-tale niṣīdatu bhavān yāvad aham api sukha-āsīno bhavāmi /

div.p: rājā gacchāgrataḥ /

note.p: rājā -- gaccha agrataḥ /

div.p: vidu etu bhavān /

note.p: vidu -- etu bhavān /

div.p: (ity ubhau parikramyopaviṣṭau )

note.p: (ity ubhau parikramya upaviṣṭau )

div.p: rā mādhavya anavāptacakṣuḥ phalo 'si / yena tvayā darśanīyaṃ na dṛṣṭam /

note.p: rā -- mādhavya anavāpta-cakṣuḥ phalo 'si / yena tvayā darśanīyaṃ na dṛṣṭam /

div.p: vidu nanu bhavān agrato me vartate /

note.p: vidu -- nanu bhavān agrato me vartate /

div.p: rā sarvaḥ kāntam ātmīyaṃ paśyati / ahaṃ tu tām āśramalalāmabhūtāṃ śakuntalām adhikṛtya bravīmi /

note.p: rā -- sarvaḥ kāntam ātmīyaṃ paśyati / ahaṃ tu tām āśrama-lalāma-bhūtāṃ śakuntalām adhikṛtya bravīmi /

div.p: vidu (svagatam) bhavatu / asyāvasaraṃ na dāsye /

note.p: vidu -- (svagatam) bhavatu / asya avasaraṃ na dāsye /

div.p: (prakāśam) bho vayasya te tāpasakanyakābhyarthanīyā dṛśyate /

note.p: (prakāśam) bho vayasya te tāpasa-kanyaka ābhyarthanīyā dṛśyate /

div.p: rā sakhe na parihārye vastuni pauravāṇāṃ manaḥ pravartate /

note.p: rā -- sakhe na parihārye vastuni pauravāṇāṃ manaḥ pravartate /

lg.l: surayuvatisaṃbhavaṃ kila muner apatyaṃ tad ujjhitādhigatam /
arkasyopari śithilaṃ cyutam iva navamālikākusumam //
sura-yuvati-saṃbhavaṃ kila muner apatyaṃ tad ujjhita-adhigatam /
arkasya upari śithilaṃ cyutam iva nava-mālikā-kusumam //

div.p: vidu )vihasya) yathā kasya api piṇḍakharjūrair udvejitasya tiṇḍyām (tintiṇyām) abhilāṣo bhavet tathā strīratnaparibhogiṇaḥ bhavata iyam abhyarthanā /

note.p: vidu -- )vihasya) yathā kasya api piṇḍa-kharjūrair udvejitasya tiṇḍyām (tintiṇyām) abhilāṣo bhavet tathā strī-ratna-paribhogiṇaḥ bhavata iyam abhyarthanā /

div.p: rā na tāvad enāṃ paśyāmi yenaivam avādīḥ /

note.p: rā -- na tāvad enāṃ paśyāmi yena evam avādīḥ /

div.p: vidu tat khalu ramaṇīyaṃ yad bhavato 'pi vismayam utpādayati /

note.p: vidu -- tat khalu ramaṇīyaṃ yad bhavato 'pi vismayam utpādayati /

div.p: rā vayasya kiṃ bahunā /

note.p: rā -- vayasya kiṃ bahunā /

lg.l:
citre niveśye parikalpitasattvayogā
rūpoccayena manasā vidhinā kṛtā nu /

strīratnasṛṣṭir aparā pratibhāti sā me
dhātur vibhutvam anucintya vapuś ca tasyāḥ //

citre niveśye parikalpita-sattva-yogā
rūpa-uccayena manasā vidhinā kṛtā nu /

strī-ratna-sṛṣṭir aparā pratibhāti sā me
dhātur vibhutvam anucintya vapuś ca tasyāḥ //

div.p: vidu yady evaṃ pratyādeśa idānīṃ rūpavatīnām /

note.p: vidu -- yady evaṃ pratyādeśa idānīṃ rūpavatīnām /

div.p: rā idaṃ ca me manasi vartate /

note.p: rā -- idaṃ ca me manasi vartate /

lg.l: anāghrātaṃ puṣpaṃ kisalayam alūnaṃ kararuhair anāviddhaṃ ratnaṃ madhu navam anāsvāditarasam /
akhaṇḍaṃ puṣyānāṃ phalam iva ca tadrūpam anaghaṃ na jāne bhoktāraṃ kam iha samupasthāsyati vidhiḥ //
anāghrātaṃ puṣpaṃ kisalayam alūnaṃ kara-ruhair anāviddhaṃ ratnaṃ madhu navam anāsvādita-rasam /
akhaṇḍaṃ puṣyānāṃ phalam iva ca tad-rūpam anaghaṃ na jāne bhoktāraṃ kam iha samupasthāsyati vidhiḥ //

div.p: vidu tena hi laghu paritrāyatām enāṃ bhavān / mā kasya api tapasvina iṅgudītairacikkaṇaśīrṣasya haste patiṣyati /

note.p: vidu -- tena hi laghu paritrāyatām enāṃ bhavān / mā kasya api tapasvina iṅgudī-taira-cikkaṇa-śīrṣasya haste patiṣyati /

div.p: rā paravatī khalu tatrabhavatī / na ca saṃnihito 'tra gurujanaḥ /

note.p: rā -- paravatī khalu tatra-bhavatī / na ca saṃnihito 'tra guru-janaḥ /

div.p: vidu atha bhavantam antareṇa kīdṛśas tasyā dṛṣṭirāgaḥ /

note.p: vidu -- atha bhavantam antareṇa kīdṛśas tasyā dṛṣṭi-rāgaḥ /

div.p: rājā nisargād evāpragalbhas tapasvikanyājanaḥ / tathāpi tu

note.p: rājā -- nisargād eva apragalbhas tapasvi-kanyā-janaḥ / tatha āpi tu

lg.l: abhimukhe mayi saṃhṛtam īkṣitaṃ hasitam anyanimitakṛtodayam /
vinayavāritavṛttir atas tayā na vivṛto madano na ca saṃvṛtaḥ //

div.p:
yāvad imān vedisaṃstaraṇārthaṃ darbhān ṛtvigbhya upaharāmi / (parikramyāvalokya ca / ākāśe) priyaṃvade kasya idam uśīrānulepanaṃ mṛṇālavanti ca nalinīpatrāṇi nīyante / (śrutim abhinīya) kiṃ bravīṣi / ātapalaṅghanād balavad asvasthā śakuntalā tasyāḥ śarīranirvāpaṇāyeti /
KSak_3.1a tarhi yatnād upacaryatām / sā khalu bhagavataḥ kaṇvasya kulapater ucchvasitam / aham api tāvad vaitānikaṃ śānty udakam asyai gautamīhaste visarjayiṣyāmi /

note.p:

KSak_3.1a2 tarhi yatnād upacaryatām / sā khalu bhagavataḥ kaṇvasya kula-pater ucchvasitam / aham api tāvad vaitānikaṃ śānty udakam asyai gautamī-haste visarjayiṣyāmi /

div.p: (madanabādhāṃ nirūpya) bhagavan kusumāyudha tvayā candramasā ca viśvasanīyābhyām atisaṃdhīyate kāmijanasārthaḥ / kutaḥ /

note.p: (madana-bādhāṃ nirūpya) bhagavan kusuma-āyudha tvayā candramasā ca viśvasanīyābhyām atisaṃdhīyate kāmi-jana-sārthaḥ / kutaḥ /

lg.l:
tava kusumaśaratvaṃ śītaraśmitvam indor
dvayam idam ayathārthaṃ dṛśyate madvidheṣu /

visṛjati himagarbhair agnim indur mayūkhais
tvam api kusumabāṇān vajrasārīkaroṣi //

tava kusuma-śaratvaṃ śīta-raśmitvam indor
dvayam idam ayathā-arthaṃ dṛśyate mad-vidheṣu /

visṛjati hima-garbhair agnim indur mayūkhais
tvam api kusuma-bāṇān vajra-sārī-karoṣi //

div.p: athavā /

note.p: athavā /

lg.l: adya api nūnaṃ harakopavahninas tvayi jvalaty aurva ivāmburāśau /
tvam anyathā manmatha madvidhānāṃ bhasmāvaśeṣaḥ katham ittham uṣṇaḥ //
adya api nūnaṃ hara-kopa-vahninas tvayi jvalaty aurva iva ambu-rāśau /
tvam anyathā manmatha mad-vidhānāṃ bhasma-avaśeṣaḥ katham ittham uṣṇaḥ //
aniśam api makaraketur manaor rujam āvahann abhimato me /
yadi madirāyatanayanāṃ tām adhikṛtya praharatīti //
aniśam api makara-ketur manaor rujam āvahann abhimato me /

div.p:

note.p:
(sakhedaṃ parikramya) kva nu khalu saṃsthite karmaṇi sadasyair anujñātaḥ khinnam ātmānaṃ vinodayāmi /
KSak_3.4a2 (niḥśvasya) kiṃ nu khalu me priyā-darśanād ṛte śaraṇam anyat /

div.p:
yāvad enām anviṣyāmi / (sūryam avalokya) imām ugrātapavelāṃ prāyeṇa latāvalayavatsu mālinītīreṣu sasakhījanā śakuntalā gamayati /
KSak_3.4a tatraiva tāvad gacchāmi / (parikramya saṃsparśaṃ rūpayitvā) aho pravātasubhago 'yam uddeśaḥ /

note.p:
yāvad enām anviṣyāmi / (sūryam avalokya) imām ugra-ātapa-velāṃ prāyeṇa latā-valayavatsu mālinī-tīreṣu sasakhī-janā śakuntalā gamayati /
KSak_3.4a4 tatra eva tāvad gacchāmi / (parikramya saṃsparśaṃ rūpayitvā) aho pravāta-subhago 'yam uddeśaḥ /

lg.l: śakyam aravindasurabhiḥ kaṇavāhī mālinītaraṅgāṇām /
aṅgair anaṅgataptair aviralam āliṅgituṃ pavanaḥ //
śakyam aravinda-surabhiḥ kaṇa-vāhī mālinī-taraṅgāṇām /
aṅgair anaṅga-taptair aviralam āliṅgituṃ pavanaḥ //

div.p: (parikramyāvalokya ca) asmin vetasaparikṣipte latāmaṇḍape saṃnihitayā śakuntalayā bhavitavyam / tathā hi /

note.p: (parikramya avalokya ca) asmin vetasa-parikṣipte latā-maṇḍape saṃnihitayā śakuntalayā bhavitavyam / tathā hi /

lg.l: abnyunnatā purastād avagāḍhā jaghanagauravāt paścāt /
dvāre 'sya pāṇḍusikate padapaṅktir dṛśyate 'bhinavā //
abnyunnatā purastād avagāḍhā jaghana-gauravāt paścāt /
dvāre 'sya pāṇḍu-sikate pada-paṅktir dṛśyate 'bhinavā //

div.p: yāvad viṭapāntareṇāvalokayāmi / (parikramya tathā kṛtvā / saharṣam) aye labdhaṃ netranirvāṇam /

note.p: yāvad viṭapa-antareṇa avalokayāmi / (parikramya tathā kṛtvā / saharṣam) aye labdhaṃ netra-nirvāṇam /

div.p: eṣā me manorathapriyatamā sakusumāstaraṇaṃ śilāpaṭṭam adhiśayānā sakhībhyām anvāsyate / bhavatu /śroṣyāmy āsāṃ viśrambhakathitāni / (iti vilokayan sthitaḥ)

note.p: eṣā me manoratha-priyatamā sakusuma-āstaraṇaṃ śilā-paṭṭam adhiśayānā sakhībhyām anvāsyate / bhavatu /śroṣyāmy āsāṃ viśrambha-kathitāni / (iti vilokayan sthitaḥ)

div.p: (tataḥ praviśati yathoktavyāpārā saha sakhībhyāṃ śakuntalā)

note.p: (tataḥ praviśati yathā-ukta-vyāpārā saha sakhībhyāṃ śakuntalā)

div.p: sakhyau (upavījya / sasneham) halā śakuntare api sukhayati nalinīpatravātaḥ /

note.p: sakhyau -- (upavījya / sasneham) halā śakuntare api sukhayati nalinī-patra-vātaḥ /

div.p: śaku kiṃ vījayato māṃ sakhyau /

note.p: śaku -- kiṃ vījayato māṃ sakhyau /

div.p: (sakhyau viṣādaṃ nāṭayitvā parasparam avalokayataḥ)

note.p: (sakhyau viṣādaṃ nāṭayitvā parasparam avalokayataḥ)

div.p: rājā balavadasvasthaśarīrā śakuntalā dṛśyate /

note.p: rājā -- balavad-asvastha-śarīrā śakuntalā dṛśyate /

div.p: (savitarkam) tat kim ayam ātapadoṣaḥ syād uta yathā me manasi vartate / (sābhilāṣaṃ nirvarṇya) atha vā kṛtaṃ saṃdehena /

note.p: (savitarkam) tat kim ayam ātapa-doṣaḥ syād uta yathā me manasi vartate / (sa-abhilāṣaṃ nirvarṇya) atha vā kṛtaṃ saṃdehena /

lg.l:
stananyastośīraṃ praśithilamṛṇālaikavalayam
priyāyāḥ sābādhaṃ kim api kamanīyaṃ vapur idam /

samas tāpaḥ kāmaṃ manasijanidāghaprasarayor
na tu grīṣmasyaivaṃ subhagam aparādhaṃ yuvatiṣu //

stana-nyasta-uśīraṃ praśithila-mṛṇāla-eka-valayam
priyāyāḥ sābādhaṃ kim api kamanīyaṃ vapur idam /

samas tāpaḥ kāmaṃ manasija-nidāgha-prasarayor
na tu grīṣmasya evaṃ subhagam aparādhaṃ yuvatiṣu //

div.p: priyaṃvadā (janāntikam) anasūye tasya rājarṣeḥ prathamadarśanārabhya paryutsukeva śakuntalā / kiṃ nu khalv asyās tannimitto 'yam ātaṅko bhavet /

note.p: priyaṃvadā -- (jana-antikam) anasūye tasya rājarṣeḥ prathama-darśana-ārabhya paryutsuka īva śakuntalā / kiṃ nu khalv asyās tan-nimitto 'yam ātaṅko bhavet /

div.p: ana sakhi mama apīdṛśy āśaṅkā hṛdayasya / bhavatu / pravakṣyāmi tāvad enām (prakāśam) / sakhi praṣṭavyāsi kim api / balavān khalu te saṃtāpaḥ /

note.p: ana -- sakhi mama apī idṛśy āśaṅkā hṛdayasya / bhavatu / pravakṣyāmi tāvad enām (prakāśam) / sakhi praṣṭavya āsi kim api / balavān khalu te saṃtāpaḥ /

div.p: śaku (pūrvārdhena śayanād utthāya) halā kiṃ vaktukāmāsi /

note.p: śaku -- (pūrva-ardhena śayanād utthāya) halā kiṃ vaktu-kāma āsi /

div.p: ana halā śakuntale anabhyantare khalv āvāṃ madanagatasya vṛttāntasya / kiṃ tu yādṛśītihāsabandheṣu kāmayamānānām avasthā śrūyate tādṛśīṃ tava paśyāmi /

note.p: ana -- halā śakuntale anabhyantare khalv āvāṃ madana-gatasya vṛtta-antasya / kiṃ tu yādṛśi ītihāsa-bandheṣu kāmayamānānām avasthā śrūyate tādṛśīṃ tava paśyāmi /

div.p: kathaya kiṃ nimittaṃ saṃtāpaḥ / vikāraṃ khalu paramārthato 'jñātvānārambhapratīkārasya /

note.p: kathaya kiṃ nimittaṃ saṃtāpaḥ / vikāraṃ khalu parama-arthato 'jñātva ānārambha-pratīkārasya /

div.p: rājā anasūyām apy anugato madīyas tarkaḥ / na hi svāmiprāyeṇa me darśanam /

note.p: rājā -- anasūyām apy anugato madīyas tarkaḥ / na hi svāmi-prāyeṇa me darśanam /

div.p: śaku (ātmagatam) balavān khalu me 'bhiniveśaḥ / idānīm api sahasaitayor na śaknomi nivedayitum /

note.p: śaku -- (ātma-gatam) balavān khalu me 'bhiniveśaḥ / idānīm api sahasa aitayor na śaknomi nivedayitum /

div.p: priyaṃvadā sakhi śakuntale suṣṭhu eṣā bhaṇati / kim ātmana ātaṅkam upekṣase / anudivasaṃ khalu parihīyase 'ṅgaiḥ / kevalaṃ lāvaṇyamayī chāyā tvāṃ na muñcati /

note.p: priyaṃvadā -- sakhi śakuntale suṣṭhu eṣā bhaṇati / kim ātmana ātaṅkam upekṣase / anudivasaṃ khalu parihīyase 'ṅgaiḥ / kevalaṃ lāvaṇyamayī chāyā tvāṃ na muñcati /

div.p: rājā avitatham āha priyaṃvadā / tathā hi

note.p: rājā -- avitatham āha priyaṃvadā / tathā hi

lg.l:
kṣāmakṣāmakapolam ānanam uraḥ kāṭhinyam uktastanam
madhyaḥ klāntataraḥ prakāmavinatāv aṃsau chaviḥ pāṇḍurā /

śocyā ca priyadarśanā ca madanakliṣṭeyam ālakṣyate
patrāṇām iva śoṣaṇena marutā spṛṣṭā latā mādhavī //

kṣāma-kṣāma-kapolam ānanam uraḥ kāṭhinyam ukta-stanam
madhyaḥ klāntataraḥ prakāma-vinatāv aṃsau chaviḥ pāṇḍurā /

śocyā ca priya-darśanā ca madana-kliṣṭa īyam ālakṣyate
patrāṇām iva śoṣaṇena marutā spṛṣṭā latā mādhavī //

div.p: śaku sakhi kasya vānyasya kathayiṣyāmi / kiṃtv āyāsayitrīdānīṃ vāṃ bhaviṣyāmi /

note.p: śaku -- sakhi kasya va ānyasya kathayiṣyāmi / kiṃtv āyāsayitri īdānīṃ vāṃ bhaviṣyāmi /

div.p: ubhe ata eva khalu nirbandha / snigdhajanasaṃvibhaktaṃ hi duḥkhaṃ sahyavedanaṃ bhavati /

note.p: ubhe -- ata eva khalu nirbandha / snigdha-jana-saṃvibhaktaṃ hi duḥkhaṃ sahya-vedanaṃ bhavati /

div.p: rājā

note.p: rājā --

lg.l:
pṛṣṭā janena samaduḥkhasukhena bālā
neyaṃ na vakṣyati manogatam ādhihetum /

dṛṣṭo vivṛtya bahuśo 'py anayā satṛṣṇam
atrāntare śravaṇakātaratāṃ gato 'smi //

pṛṣṭā janena sama-duḥkha-sukhena bālā
na iyaṃ na vakṣyati mano-gatam ādhi-hetum /

dṛṣṭo vivṛtya bahuśo 'py anayā satṛṣṇam
atra-antare śravaṇa-kātaratāṃ gato 'smi //

div.p: śaku sakhi yataḥprabhṛti mama darśanapatham āgataḥ sa tapovanarakṣitā rājarṣiḥ (ity arthokte lajāṃ nāṭayati)

note.p: śaku -- sakhi yataḥ-prabhṛti mama darśana-patham āgataḥ sa tapo-vana-rakṣitā rājarṣiḥ (ity artha-ukte lajāṃ nāṭayati)

div.p: ubhe kathayatu priyasakhī /

note.p: ubhe -- kathayatu priya-sakhī /

div.p: śaku tata ārabhya tadgatenābhilāṣeṇa etad avasthāsmi saṃvṛttā /

note.p: śaku -- tata ārabhya tadgatena abhilāṣeṇa etad avastha āsmi saṃvṛttā /

div.p: rājā (saharṣam) śrutaṃ śrotavyam /

note.p: rājā -- (saharṣam) śrutaṃ śrotavyam /

lg.l: smara eva tāpahetur nirvāpayitā sa eva me jātaḥ /
divasa ivābhraśyāmas tapātyaye jīvalokasya //
smara eva tāpa-hetur nirvāpayitā sa eva me jātaḥ /
divasa iva abhra-śyāmas tapa-atyaye jīva-lokasya //

div.p: śaku tad yadi vām anumataṃ tathā vartethāṃ yathā tasya rājarṣer anukampanīyā bhavāmi / anyathāvaśyaṃ siñcata me tilodakam /

note.p: śaku -- tad yadi vām anumataṃ tathā vartethāṃ yathā tasya rājarṣer anukampanīyā bhavāmi / anyatha āvaśyaṃ siñcata me tila-udakam /

div.p: rājā saṃśayachedi vacanam /

note.p: rājā -- saṃśaya-chedi vacanam /

div.p: priyaṃvadā (janāntikam) anasūye dūragatamanmathākṣameyaṃ kālaharaṇasya /

note.p: priyaṃvadā -- (jana-antikam) anasūye dūra-gata-manmatha ākṣama īyaṃ kāla-haraṇasya /

div.p: yasmin baddhabhāvaiṣā sa lalāmabhūtaḥ pauravāṇām / tad yuktam asyā abhilāṣo 'bhinanditum /

note.p: yasmin baddha-bhāva aiṣā sa lalāma-bhūtaḥ pauravāṇām / tad yuktam asyā abhilāṣo 'bhinanditum /

div.p: ana tathā yathā bhaṇasi /

note.p: ana -- tathā yathā bhaṇasi /

div.p: pri (prakāśam) sakhi diṣṭyānurūpas te 'bhiniveśaḥ / sāgaram ujjhitvā kutra vā mahānady avatarati / ka idānīṃ sahakāram antareṇātimuktalatāṃ pallavitāṃ sahate /

note.p: pri -- (prakāśam) sakhi diṣṭya ānurūpas te 'bhiniveśaḥ / sāgaram ujjhitvā kutra vā mahā-nady avatarati / ka idānīṃ sahakāram antareṇa atimukta-latāṃ pallavitāṃ sahate /

div.p: rājā kim atra citraṃ yadi viśākhe śaśāṅkalekhām anuvartete /

note.p: rājā -- kim atra citraṃ yadi viśākhe śaśa-aṅka-lekhām anuvartete /

div.p: ana kaḥ punar upāyo bhaved yenāvilambitaṃ nibhṛtaṃ ca sakhyā manorathaṃ saṃpādayāvaḥ /

note.p: ana -- kaḥ punar upāyo bhaved yena avilambitaṃ nibhṛtaṃ ca sakhyā manorathaṃ saṃpādayāvaḥ /

div.p: pri nibhṛtam iti cintanīyaṃ bhavet / śīghram iti sukaram /

note.p: pri -- nibhṛtam iti cintanīyaṃ bhavet / śīghram iti sukaram /

div.p: ana katham iva /

note.p: ana -- katham iva /

div.p: pri nanu sa rājarṣir asyāṃ snigdhadṛṣṭyā sūcitābhilāṣa etān divasān prajāgarakṛśo lakṣyate /

note.p: pri -- nanu sa rājarṣir asyāṃ snigdha-dṛṣṭyā sūcita-abhilāṣa etān divasān prajāgara-kṛśo lakṣyate /

div.p: rājā satyam itthaṃ bhūta evāsmi / tathā hi

note.p: rājā -- satyam itthaṃ bhūta eva asmi / tathā hi

lg.l:
idam aśiśirair antastāpād vivarṇam aṇīkṛtam
niśi niśi bhujanyastāpāṅgaprasāribhir aśrubhiḥ /

alabhilulitajyāghātāṅkaṃ muhur maṇibandhanāt
kanakavalayaṃ srastaṃ srastaṃ mayā pratisāryate //

idam aśiśirair antas-tāpād vivarṇam aṇī-kṛtam
niśi niśi bhuja-nyasta-apāṅga-prasāribhir aśrubhiḥ /

alabhilulita-jyā-ghāta-aṅkaṃ muhur maṇi-bandhanāt
kanaka-valayaṃ srastaṃ srastaṃ mayā pratisāryate //

div.p: pri (vicintya) halā madanalekho 'sya kriyatāṃ taṃ sumanogopitaṃ kṛtvā devaprasādasyāpadeśena tasya hastaṃ prāpayiṣyāmi /

note.p: pri -- (vicintya) halā madana-lekho 'sya kriyatāṃ taṃ sumano-gopitaṃ kṛtvā deva-prasādasya apadeśena tasya hastaṃ prāpayiṣyāmi /

div.p: ana rocate me sukumāraḥ prayogaḥ kiṃ vā śakuntalā bhaṇati /

note.p: ana -- rocate me sukumāraḥ prayogaḥ kiṃ vā śakuntalā bhaṇati /

div.p: śaku kiṃ niyogo vāṃ vikalpyate /

note.p: śaku -- kiṃ niyogo vāṃ vikalpyate /

div.p: pri tena hy ātmana upanyāsapūrvaṃ cintaya tāvat kim api lalitapadabandhanam /

note.p: pri -- tena hy ātmana upanyāsa-pūrvaṃ cintaya tāvat kim api lalita-pada-bandhanam /

div.p: śaku halā cintayāmy aham / avadhīraṇābhīrukaṃ punar vepate me hṛdayam /

note.p: śaku -- halā cintayāmy aham / avadhīraṇā-bhīrukaṃ punar vepate me hṛdayam /

div.p: rājā (saharṣam)

note.p: rājā -- (saharṣam)

lg.l:
ayaṃ sa te tiṣṭhati saṃgamotsuko
viśaṅkase bhīru yato 'vadhīraṇām /

labheta vā prārthayitā na vā śriyam
śriyā durāpaḥ katham īpsito bhavet //

ayaṃ sa te tiṣṭhati saṃgama-utsuko
viśaṅkase bhīru yato 'vadhīraṇām /

labheta vā prārthayitā na vā śriyam
śriyā durāpaḥ katham īpsito bhavet //

div.p: sakhyau ayi ātmaguṇāvamānini ka idānīṃ śarīranirvāpayitrī śāradīṃ jyotsnāṃ paṭāntena vārayati /

note.p: sakhyau -- ayi ātma-guṇa-avamānini ka idānīṃ śarīra-nirvāpayitrī śāradīṃ jyotsnāṃ paṭa-antena vārayati /

div.p: śaku (sasmitam) niyojitedānīm asmi / (ity upaviṣṭāṃ cintayati)

note.p: śaku -- (sasmitam) niyojita īdānīm asmi / (ity upaviṣṭāṃ cintayati)

div.p: rājā sthāne khalu vismṛta+nimeṣeṇa cakṣuṣā priyām avalokayāmi / yataḥ

note.p: rājā -- sthāne khalu vismṛta+nimeṣeṇa cakṣuṣā priyām avalokayāmi / yataḥ --

lg.l: unnamitaikabhrūlatam ānanam asyāḥ padāni racayantyāḥ /
kaṇṭakitena prathayati may anurāgaṃ kapolena //
unnamita-eka-bhrū-latam ānanam asyāḥ padāni racayantyāḥ /
kaṇṭakitena prathayati may anurāgaṃ kapolena //

div.p: śaku halā cintitaṃ mayā gītavastu / asaṃnihitāni punar lekhanasādhanāni /

note.p: śaku -- halā cintitaṃ mayā gīta-vastu / asaṃnihitāni punar lekhana-sādhanāni /

div.p: pri etasmiñ śukodarasukumāre nalinīpatre nakhair nikṣiptavarṇaṃ kuru /

note.p: pri -- etasmiñ śuka-udara-sukumāre nalinī-patre nakhair nikṣipta-varṇaṃ kuru /

div.p: śaku (yathoktaṃ rūpayitvā) halā śṛṇutam idānīṃ saṃgatārthaṃ na veti /

note.p: śaku -- (yathā-uktaṃ rūpayitvā) halā śṛṇutam idānīṃ saṃgata-arthaṃ na va īti /

div.p: ubhe avahite svaḥ /

note.p: ubhe -- avahite svaḥ /

div.p: śaku (vācayati)

note.p: śaku -- (vācayati)

lg.l: tava na jāne hṛdayaṃ mama punaḥ kāmo divā api rātrāv api /
nirghṛṇa tapati balīyas tvayi vṛttamanorathāyā aṅgāni //
tava na jāne hṛdayaṃ mama punaḥ kāmo divā api rātrāv api /
nirghṛṇa tapati balīyas tvayi vṛtta-manorathāyā aṅgāni //

note.p: rājā -- (sahasa ūpasṛtya)

lg.l: tapati tanugātri madanas tvām aniśaṃ māṃ punar dahaty eva /
glapayati yathā śaśāṅkaṃ na tathā hi kumudvatīṃ divasaḥ //
tapati tanu-gātri madanas tvām aniśaṃ māṃ punar dahaty eva /
glapayati yathā śaśa-aṅkaṃ na tathā hi kumudvatīṃ divasaḥ //

div.p: sakhyau (vilokya saharṣam utthāya) svāgatam avilambino manorathasya /

note.p: sakhyau -- (vilokya saharṣam utthāya) svāgatam avilambino manorathasya /

div.p: (śakuntalābhyutthātum icchati)

note.p: (śakuntala ābhyutthātum icchati)

div.p: rājā alam alam āyāsena /

note.p: rājā -- alam alam āyāsena /

lg.l: saṃdaṣṭasukumaśayanāny āśuktāntabisabhaṅgasurabhīṇi /
guruparitāpāni na te gātrāṇy upacāram arhanti //
saṃdaṣṭa-sukuma-śayanāny āśukta-anta-bisa-bhaṅga-surabhīṇi /
guru-paritāpāni na te gātrāṇy upacāram arhanti //

div.p: ana itaḥ śilātalaikadeśam alaṃkarotu vayasyaḥ /

note.p: ana --- itaḥ śilā-tala-eka-deśam alaṃkarotu vayasyaḥ /

div.p: (rājopaviśati / śakuntalā salajjā tiṣṭhati)

note.p: (rāja ūpaviśati / śakuntalā salajjā tiṣṭhati)

div.p: pri dvayor api yuvayor anyonyānurāgaḥ pratyakṣaḥ / sakhīsnehaḥ punar māṃ punar uktavādinīṃ karoti /

note.p: pri -- dvayor api yuvayor anyonya-anurāgaḥ pratyakṣaḥ / sakhī-snehaḥ punar māṃ punar ukta-vādinīṃ karoti /

div.p: rājā bhadre naitat parhāryam / vivakṣitaṃ hy anuktam anutāpaṃ janayati /

note.p: rājā -- bhadre na etat parhāryam / vivakṣitaṃ hy anuktam anutāpaṃ janayati /

div.p: pri āpannasya viṣayanivāsino janasyārtihareṇa rājñā bhavitavyam ity eṣa vo dharmaḥ /

note.p: pri -- āpannasya viṣaya-nivāsino janasyā arti-hareṇa rājñā bhavitavyam ity eṣa vo dharmaḥ /

div.p: rājā nāsmāt param /

mama virahajāṃ na tvaṃ vatse śucaṃ gaṇayiṣyāmi //

jāto mamāyaṃ viśadaḥ prakāmaṃ pratyarpitanyāsa ivāntarātmā //
artho hi kanyā parakīya eva tām adya saṃpreṣya parigrahītuḥ /
jāto mama ayaṃ viśadaḥ prakāmaṃ pratyarpita-nyāsa iva antar-ātmā //

div.head: pañcamo 'ṅkaḥ /

note.p: (tataḥ praviśaty āsanasho rājā vidūṣakaś ca)

div.p: vidu (karṇaṃ dattvā) bho vayasya saṃgītaśālāntare 'vadhānaṃ dehi /

note.p: vidu -- (karṇaṃ dattvā) bho vayasya saṃgīta-śāla-antare 'vadhānaṃ dehi /

div.p: kalaviśuddhāyā gīteḥ svarasaṃyogaḥ śrūyate / jāne tatrabhavatī haṃsapadikā varṇaparicayaṃ karotīti /

note.p: kala-viśuddhāyā gīteḥ svara-saṃyogaḥ śrūyate / jāne tatra-bhavatī haṃsa-padikā varṇa-paricayaṃ karoti iti /

div.p: rājā tūṣṇīṃ bhava / yāvad ākarṇayāmi / (ākāśe gīyate)

note.p: rājā -- tūṣṇīṃ bhava / yāvad ākarṇayāmi / (ākāśe gīyate)

lg.l: abhinavamadhulolupas tvaṃ tathā paricumbya cūtamañjarīm /
kamalavasatimātranirvṛto madhukara vismṛto 'sy enāṃ katham //
abhinava-madhu-lolupas tvaṃ tathā paricumbya cūta-mañjarīm /
kamala-vasati-mātra-nirvṛto madhu-kara vismṛto 'sy enāṃ katham //

div.p: rājā aho rāgaparivāhiṇī gītiḥ /

note.p: rājā -- aho rāga-parivāhiṇī gītiḥ /

div.p: vidu kiṃ tāvad gītyā avagato 'kṣarārthaḥ /

note.p: vidu -- kiṃ tāvad gītyā avagato 'kṣara-arthaḥ /

div.p: rā (smitaṃ kṛtvā) sakṛtkṛtapraṇayo 'yaṃ janaḥ / tad asyā devīṃ vasumatīm antareṇa mahad upālambhanaṃ gato 'smi / sakhe mādhavya madvacanād ucyatāṃ haṃsapadikā / nipuṇam upālabdhāḥ sma iti /

note.p: rā -- (smitaṃ kṛtvā) sakṛt-kṛta-praṇayo 'yaṃ janaḥ / tad asyā devīṃ vasumatīm antareṇa mahad upālambhanaṃ gato 'smi / sakhe mādhavya mad-vacanād ucyatāṃ haṃsa-padikā / nipuṇam upālabdhāḥ sma iti /

div.p: vidu yad bhavān ājñāpayati / (utthāya+bho vayasya gṛhītasya tayā parakīyair hastaiḥ śikhaṇḍake tāḍyamānasyāpsarasā vītarāgasyeva nāstīdānīṃ me mokṣaḥ /

note.p: vidu -- yad bhavān ājñāpayati / (utthāya+bho vayasya gṛhītasya tayā parakīyair hastaiḥ śikhaṇḍake tāḍyamānasya apsarasā vīta-rāgasya iva na asti idānīṃ me mokṣaḥ /

div.p: rā gaccha / nāgarikavṛttyā saṃjñāpayainām /

note.p: rā - gaccha / nāgarika-vṛttyā saṃjñāpaya enām /

div.p: rā (ātmagatam) kiṃ nu khalu gītam evaṃ vidhārtham ākarṇyeṣṭajanavirahād ṛte 'pi balavadutkaṇṭhito 'smi / athavā /

note.p: rā -- (ātma-gatam) kiṃ nu khalu gītam evaṃ vidha-artham ākarṇya iṣṭa-jana-virahād ṛte 'pi balavad-utkaṇṭhito 'smi / athavā /

lg.l: ramyāṇi vīkṣya madhurāṃś ca niśamya śabdān paryutsuko bhavati yat sukhito 'pi jantuḥ /
tac cetasā smarati nūnam abodhapūrvaṃ bhāvasthirāṇi jananāntarasauhṛdāni //
ramyāṇi vīkṣya madhurāṃś ca niśamya śabdān paryutsuko bhavati yat sukhito 'pi jantuḥ /
tac cetasā smarati nūnam abodha-pūrvaṃ bhāva-sthirāṇi janana-antara-sauhṛdāni //

note.p: (iti paryākulas tiṣṭhati)

div.p: (tataḥ praviśati kañcukī)

note.p: (tataḥ praviśati kañcukī)

div.p: kañcukī aho nu khalv īdṛśīm avasthāṃ pratipanno 'smi /

note.p: kañcukī -- aho nu khalv īdṛśīm avasthāṃ pratipanno 'smi /

lg.l:
ācāra ity avahitena mayā gṛhītā
yā vetrayaṣṭir avarodhagṛheṣu rājñaḥ /

kāle gate bahutithe mama saiva jātā
prasthānaviklavagater avalambanārthā //

ācāra ity avahitena mayā gṛhītā
yā vetra-yaṣṭir avarodha-gṛheṣu rājñaḥ /

kāle gate bahu-tithe mama sa aiva jātā
prasthāna-viklava-gater avalambana-arthā //

div.p: bho kāmaṃ dharmakāryam anatipātyaṃ devasya / tathāpīdānīm eva dharmāsanād utthitāya punar uparodhakāri kaṇvaśiṣyāgamanam asmai notsahe nivedayitum / athavāviśramo 'yaṃ lokatantrādhikāraḥ / kutaḥ /

note.p: bho kāmaṃ dharma-kāryam anatipātyaṃ devasya / tatha āpi idānīm eva dharma-āsanād utthitāya punar uparodha-kāri kaṇva-śiṣya-āgamanam asmai na utsahe nivedayitum / athava āviśramo 'yaṃ loka-tantra-adhikāraḥ / kutaḥ /

lg.l: bhānuḥ sakṛd yuktaturaṅga eva rātriṃ divaṃ gandhavahaḥ prayāti /
śeṣaḥ sadā evāhitabhūmibhāraḥ ṣaṣṭhāṃśavṛtter api dharma eṣaḥ //
bhānuḥ sakṛd yukta-turaṅga eva rātriṃ divaṃ gandha-vahaḥ prayāti /
śeṣaḥ sadā evā ahita-bhūmi-bhāraḥ ṣaṣṭha-aṃśa-vṛtter api dharma eṣaḥ //

div.p: yāvan niyogam anutiṣṭhāmi / (parikramyāvalokya ca) eṣa devaḥ

note.p: yāvan niyogam anutiṣṭhāmi / (parikramya avalokya ca) eṣa devaḥ --

lg.l:
prajāḥ prajāḥ svā iva tantrayitvā
niṣevate śrāntamanā viviktam /

yūthāni saṃcārya raviprataptaḥ
śītaṃ divā sthānam iva dvipendraḥ //

prajāḥ prajāḥ svā iva tantrayitvā
niṣevate śrānta-manā viviktam /

yūthāni saṃcārya ravi-prataptaḥ
śītaṃ divā sthānam iva dvipa-indraḥ //

div.p: (upagamya) jayatu jayatu devaḥ / ete khalu himagirer upatyakāraṇyavāsinaḥ kāśyapasaṃdeśam ādāya sastrīkās tapasvinaḥ saṃprāptāḥ / śrutvā devaḥ pramāṇam /

note.p: (upagamya) jayatu jayatu devaḥ / ete khalu hima-girer upatyaka-araṇya-vāsinaḥ kāśyapa-saṃdeśam ādāya sastrīkās tapasvinaḥ saṃprāptāḥ / śrutvā devaḥ pramāṇam /

div.p: rā (sādaram) kiṃ kāśyapasaṃdeśahāriṇaḥ /

note.p: rā -- (sādaram) kiṃ kāśyapa-saṃdeśa-hāriṇaḥ /

div.p: kañcukī atha kim /

note.p: kañcukī -- atha kim /

div.p: rā tena hi madvacanād vijñāpyatām upādhyāha somarātaḥ / amūn āśramavāsinaḥ śrautena vidhinā satkṛtya svayam eva praveśayitum arhasīti / aham apy atra tapasvidarśanocite pradeśe sthitaḥ pratipālayāmi /

note.p: rā -- tena hi mad-vacanād vijñāpyatām upādhyāha soma-rātaḥ / amūn āśrama-vāsinaḥ śrautena vidhinā satkṛtya svayam eva praveśayitum arhasi iti / aham apy atra tapasvi-darśana-ucite pradeśe sthitaḥ pratipālayāmi /

div.p: kañcukī yad ājñāpayati devaḥ (iti niṣkrāntaḥ)

note.p: kañcukī -- yad ājñāpayati devaḥ (iti niṣkrāntaḥ)

div.p: rā (utthāya) vetravati agniśaraṇamārgam ādeśaya /

note.p: rā -- (utthāya) vetravati agni-śaraṇa-mārgam ādeśaya /

div.p: pratihārī ita ito devaḥ /

note.p: pratihārī -- ita ito devaḥ /

div.p: rā (parikrāmati / adhikārakhedaṃ nirūpya) sarvaḥ prārthitam artham adhigamya sukhī saṃpadyate jantuḥ / rājñāṃ tu caritārthatā duḥkhottaraiva /

note.p: rā -- (parikrāmati / adhikāra-khedaṃ nirūpya) sarvaḥ prārthitam artham adhigamya sukhī saṃpadyate jantuḥ / rājñāṃ tu carita-arthatā duḥkha-uttara aiva /

lg.l:
autsukyamātram avasāyayati pratiṣṭhā
kliśnāti labdhaparipālanavṛttir eva /

nātiśramāpanayanāya yathā śramāya
rājyaṃ svahastadhṛtadaṇḍam ivātapatram //

autsukya-mātram avasāyayati pratiṣṭhā
kliśnāti labdha-paripālana-vṛttir eva /

na atiśrama-apanayanāya yathā śramāya
rājyaṃ sva-hasta-dhṛta-daṇḍam ivā atapatram //

div.p: vaitālikau vijayatāṃ devaḥ /

note.p: vaitālikau -- vijayatāṃ devaḥ /

lg.l:
prathamaḥ svasukhanirabhilāṣaḥ khidyase lokahetoḥ
pratidinam athavā te vṛttir evaṃ vidhaiva /

anubhavati hi mūrdhnā padapa tīvram uṣṇam
śamayati paritāpaṃ chāyayā saṃśritānām //

prathamaḥ -- sva-sukha-nirabhilāṣaḥ khidyase loka-hetoḥ
pratidinam athavā te vṛttir evaṃ vidha aiva /

anubhavati hi mūrdhnā padapa tīvram uṣṇam
śamayati paritāpaṃ chāyayā saṃśritānām //

div.p: dvitīyaḥ

note.p: dvitīyaḥ --

lg.l:
niyamayasi vimārgaprasthitān āttadaṇḍaḥ
praśamayasi vivādaṃ kalpase rakṣaṇāya /

atanuṣu vibhaveṣu jñātayaḥ santu nāma
tvayi tu parisamāptaṃ bandhukṛtya prajānām //

niyamayasi vimārga-prasthitān ātta-daṇḍaḥ
praśamayasi vivādaṃ kalpase rakṣaṇāya /

atanuṣu vibhaveṣu jñātayaḥ santu nāma
tvayi tu parisamāptaṃ bandhu-kṛtya prajānām //

note.p: rājā -- ete klānta-manasaḥ punar navī-kṛtāḥ smaḥ / (iti parikrāmati)

div.p: pratihārī eṣa abhinavasaṃmārjanasaśrīkaḥ saṃnihitahomadhenur agniśaraṇālindaḥ / ārohatu devaḥ /

note.p: pratihārī -- eṣa abhinava-saṃmārjana-saśrīkaḥ saṃnihita-homa-dhenur agni-śaraṇa-alindaḥ / ārohatu devaḥ /

div.p: rā (āruhya parijanāṃsāvalambī tiṣṭhati) vetravati kim uddiśya bhagavatā kāśyapena matsakāśam ṛṣayaḥ preṣitāḥ syuḥ /

note.p: rā -- (āruhya parijana-aṃsa-avalambī tiṣṭhati) vetravati kim uddiśya bhagavatā kāśyapena mat-sakāśam ṛṣayaḥ preṣitāḥ syuḥ /

lg.l:
kiṃ tāvad vratinām upoḍhatapasāṃ vighnais tapo dūṣitam
dharmāraṇyacareṣu kenacid uta prāṇiṣv asacceṣṭitam /

āhosvit prasavo mamāpacaritair viṣṭambhito vīrudhām
ity ārūḍhabahupratarkam aparicchedākulaṃ me manaḥ //

kiṃ tāvad vratinām upoḍha-tapasāṃ vighnais tapo dūṣitam
dharma-araṇya-careṣu kenacid uta prāṇiṣv asac-ceṣṭitam /

āhosvit prasavo mama apacaritair viṣṭambhito vīrudhām
ity ārūḍha-bahu-pratarkam apariccheda-ākulaṃ me manaḥ //

div.p: pratihārī sucaritanandina ṛṣayo devaṃ sabhājayitum āgatā iti tarkayāmi /

note.p: pratihārī -- sucarita-nandina ṛṣayo devaṃ sabhājayitum āgatā iti tarkayāmi /

div.p: (tataḥ praviśanti gautamī sahitāḥ śakuntalāṃ puraskṛtya munayaḥ / puraś caiṣāṃ kañcukī purohitaś ca)

note.p: (tataḥ praviśanti gautamī sahitāḥ śakuntalāṃ puras-kṛtya munayaḥ / puraś ca eṣāṃ kañcukī purohitaś ca)

div.p: śārṅgarava śāradvata /

note.p: śārṅgarava -- śāradvata /

lg.l:
mahābhāgaḥ kāmaṃ narapatir abhinnasthitir asau
na kaścid varṇānām apatham apakṛṣṭo 'pi bhajate /

tathāpīdaṃ śaśvatparicitaviviktena manasā /
janākīrṇaṃ manye hutavahaparītaṃ gṛham iva //

mahā-bhāgaḥ kāmaṃ nara-patir abhinna-sthitir asau
na kaścid varṇānām apatham apakṛṣṭo 'pi bhajate /

tatha āpi idaṃ śaśvat-paricita-viviktena manasā /
jana-ākīrṇaṃ manye huta-vaha-parītaṃ gṛham iva //

div.p: śāradvata sthāne bhavān purapraveśād itthaṃ bhūtaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ / aham api

note.p: śāradvata -- sthāne bhavān pura-praveśād itthaṃ bhūtaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ / aham api

lg.l: abhyaktam api snātaḥ śucir aśucim iva prabuddha iva suptam /
baddham iva svairagatir janam iha sukhasaṅginam avaimi //
abhyaktam api snātaḥ śucir aśucim iva prabuddha iva suptam /

div.p: śaku (nimittaṃ sūcayitvā) aho kiṃ me vāmetaran nayanaṃ visphurati /

note.p: śaku -- (nimittaṃ sūcayitvā) aho kiṃ me vāma-itaran nayanaṃ visphurati /

note.p: śārṅgarava -- bho mahā-brāhmaṇa kāmam etad abhinandanīyaṃ tatha āpi vayam atra madhyasthāḥ / kutaḥ

lg.l: bhavanti naṃrās taravaḥ phalāgamair navāmbubhir dūravilambino ghanāḥ /
anuddhatāḥ satpuruṣāḥ samṛddhibhiḥ svabhāva evaiṣa paropakāriṇām //
bhavanti naṃrās taravaḥ phala-āgamair nava-ambubhir dūra-vilambino ghanāḥ /
anuddhatāḥ sat-puruṣāḥ samṛddhibhiḥ svabhāva eva eṣa para-upakāriṇām //

div.p: pratīhārī deva prasannamukhavarṇā dṛśyante / jānāmi viśrabdhakāryā ṛṣayaḥ /

note.p: pratīhārī -- deva prasanna-mukha-varṇā dṛśyante / jānāmi viśrabdha-kāryā ṛṣayaḥ /

div.p: rājā (śakuntalāṃ dṛṣṭvā) athātra bhavatī

lg.l: kā svid avaguṇṭhanavatī nātiparisphuṭaśarīralāvaṇyā /
madhye tapodhanānāṃ kisalayam iva pāṇḍupatrāṇām //
kā svid avaguṇṭhanavatī na atiparisphuṭa-śarīra-lāvaṇyā /
madhye tapodhanānāṃ kisalayam iva pāṇḍu-patrāṇām //

div.p: pratīhārī deva kutūhalagarbhaḥ prahito na me tarkaḥ prasarati / nanu darśanīyā punar asyā ākṛtir lakṣyate /

note.p: pratīhārī -- deva kutūhala-garbhaḥ prahito na me tarkaḥ prasarati / nanu darśanīyā punar asyā ākṛtir lakṣyate /

lg.l:

śakuntalā mūrtimatī ca satkriyā /

samānayaṃs tulyaguṇaṃ vadhūvaram
cirasya vācyaṃ na gataḥ prajāpatiḥ //

tvam arhatāṃ prāgrasaraḥ smṛto 'si naḥ
śakuntalā mūrtimatī ca satkriyā /

samānayaṃs tulya-guṇaṃ vadhū-varam
cirasya vācyaṃ na gataḥ prajā-patiḥ //

satīm api jñātikulaikasaṃśrayām
jano 'nyathā bhartṛmatīṃ viśaṅkate /

ataḥ samīpe pariṇetur iṣyate /
priyāpriyā vā pramadā svabandhubhiḥ //

jano 'nyathā bhartṛmatīṃ viśaṅkate /

lg.l:
idam upanatam evaṃ rūpam akliṣṭakānti
prathamaparigṛhītaṃ syān na vety avyavasyan /

bhramara iva vibhāte kundam antastuṣāram
na ca khalu parobhoktuṃ nāpi śaknomi hātum //

idam upanatam evaṃ rūpam akliṣṭa-kānti
prathama-parigṛhītaṃ syān na va īty avyavasyan /

bhramara iva vibhāte kundam antas-tuṣāram
na ca khalu parobhoktuṃ na api śaknomi hātum //

div.p: (iti vicārayan sthitaḥ)

note.p: (iti vicārayan sthitaḥ)

div.p: pratīhārī (svagatam) aho dharmāpekṣitā bhartuḥ / īdṛśaṃ nāma sukhopanataṃ rūpaṃ dṛṣṭā ko 'nyo vicārayati /

note.p: pratīhārī -- (svagatam) aho dharma-apekṣitā bhartuḥ / īdṛśaṃ nāma sukha-upanataṃ rūpaṃ dṛṣṭā ko 'nyo vicārayati /

div.p: śā bho rājan kim iti joṣam āsyate /

note.p: śā -- bho rājan kim iti joṣam āsyate /

div.p: rā bhos tapodhanāḥ cintayann api na khalu svīkaraṇam atrabhavatyāḥ smarāmi / tat katham imām abhivyaktasattvalakṣaṇāṃ pratyātmānaṃ kṣetriṇam aśaṅkamānaḥ pratipatsye /

note.p: rā -- bhos tapo-dhanāḥ cintayann api na khalu svīkaraṇam atra-bhavatyāḥ smarāmi / tat katham imām abhivyakta-sattva-lakṣaṇāṃ pratyātmānaṃ kṣetriṇam aśaṅkamānaḥ pratipatsye /

div.p: śakuntalā (apavārya) āryasya pariṇaya eva saṃdehaḥ / kuta idānīṃ me dūrādhirohiṇy āśā /

note.p: śakuntalā -- (apavārya) āryasya pariṇaya eva saṃdehaḥ / kuta idānīṃ me dūra-adhirohiṇy āśā /

div.p: śār mā tāvat /

note.p: śār -- mā tāvat /

lg.l: kṛtābhimarśām anumanyamānaḥ sutāṃ tvayā nāma munir vimānyaḥ /
muṣṭaṃ pratigrāhayatā svam arthaṃ pātrīkṛto dasyur ivāsi yena //
kṛta-abhimarśām anumanyamānaḥ sutāṃ tvayā nāma munir vimānyaḥ /
muṣṭaṃ pratigrāhayatā svam arthaṃ pātrī-kṛto dasyur iva asi yena //

div.p: śāradvata śārṅgarava vimara tvam idānīm / śakuntale vaktavyam uktam asmābhiḥ / so 'yam atrabhavān evam āha / dīyatām asmai pratyayaprativacanam /

note.p: śāradvata -- śārṅgarava vimara tvam idānīm / śakuntale vaktavyam uktam asmābhiḥ / so 'yam atra-bhavān evam āha / dīyatām asmai pratyaya-prativacanam /

div.p: śaku (apavārya) idam avasthhāntaraṃ gate tādṛśe 'nurāge kiṃ vā smāritena / ātmedānīṃ me śocanīya iti vyavasitam etat / (prakāśam)

note.p: śaku -- (apavārya) idam avasthhā-antaraṃ gate tādṛśe 'nurāge kiṃ vā smāritena / ātma īdānīṃ me śocanīya iti vyavasitam etat / (prakāśam)

div.p: paurava yuktaṃ nāma te tathā purāśramapade svabhāvottānahṛdayam imaṃ janaṃ samayapūrvaṃ pratārya sāṃpratam īdṛśair akṣaraiḥ pratyākhyātum /

note.p: paurava yuktaṃ nāma te tathā purā āśrama-pade svabhāva-uttāna-hṛdayam imaṃ janaṃ samaya-pūrvaṃ pratārya sāṃpratam īdṛśair akṣaraiḥ pratyākhyātum /

note.p: rājā -- (karṇau vidhāya) śāntaṃ pāpam /

div.p: śaku bhavatu / yadi paramārthataḥ paraparigrahaśaṅkinā tvayaivaṃ pravṛttaṃ tad+abhijñānenānena tavāśaṅkām apaneṣyāmi /

note.p: śaku -- bhavatu / yadi parama-arthataḥ para-parigraha-śaṅkinā tvaya aivaṃ pravṛttaṃ tad+abhijñānena anena tavā aśaṅkām apaneṣyāmi /

div.p: śaku (mudrāsthānaṃ parāmṛśya) hā dhig ghā dhik / aṅgulīyakaśūnyā me 'ṅguliḥ / (iti saviṣādaṃ gautamīm avekṣate)

note.p: śaku -- (mudrā-sthānaṃ parāmṛśya) hā dhig ghā dhik / aṅgulīyaka-śūnyā me 'ṅguliḥ / (iti saviṣādaṃ gautamīm avekṣate)

note.p: gautamī - nūnaṃ te śakra-avatāra-abhyantare śacī-tīrtha-salilaṃ vandamānāyāḥ prabhraṣṭam aṅgulīyakam /

note.p: rājā -- (sasmitam) idaṃ tat pratyutpanna-mati straiṇam iti yad ucyate /

note.p: śaku -- atra tāvad vidhinā darśitaṃ prabhutvam /

note.p: rājā -- śrotavyam idānīṃ saṃvṛttam /

note.p: śaku -- nanv ekasmin divase navamālikā-maṇḍape nalinī-patra-bhājana-gatam udakaṃ tava haste saṃnihitam āsīt /

note.p: rājā -- śṛṇumas tāvat /

note.p: śaku -- tat-kṣaṇe sa me putra-kṛtako dīrgha-apāṅgo nāma mṛga-potaka upasthitaḥ /

div.p: tvayāyaṃ tāvat prathamaṃ pibatv ity anukampinopacchandita udakena / na punas te 'paricayād hastābhyāsam upagataḥ / paścāt tasminn eva mayā gṛhīte salile 'nena kṛtaḥ praṇayaḥ / tadā tvam itthaṃ prahasito 'si / sarvaḥ sagandheṣu viśvasiti / dvāv apy atrāraṇyakāv iti /

note.p: tvaya āyaṃ tāvat prathamaṃ pibatv ity anukampina ūpacchandita udakena / na punas te 'paricayād hasta-abhyāsam upagataḥ / paścāt tasminn eva mayā gṛhīte salile 'nena kṛtaḥ praṇayaḥ / tadā tvam itthaṃ prahasito 'si / sarvaḥ sagandheṣu viśvasiti / dvāv apy atra araṇyakāv iti /

div.p: rājā evam ādibhir ātmakāryanirvartinīnām anṛtamayavān madhubhir ākṛṣyate viṣayiṇaḥ /

note.p: rājā -- evam ādibhir ātma-kārya-nirvartinīnām anṛtamaya-vān madhubhir ākṛṣyate viṣayiṇaḥ /

saṃdṛśyate kim uta yāḥ pratibodhavatyaḥ /

prāgantarikṣagamanās tvam apatyajātam
anyair dvijaiḥ parabhṛtāḥ khalu poṣayanti //

strīṇām aśikṣita-paṭutvam amānuṣīṣu
saṃdṛśyate kim uta yāḥ pratibodhavatyaḥ /

prāg-antarikṣa-gamanās tvam apatya-jātam
anyair dvijaiḥ para-bhṛtāḥ khalu poṣayanti //

div.p: śaku (saroṣam+anārya ātmano hṛdayānumānena prekṣase / ka idānīm anyo dharmakañcukapraveśinas tṛṇachannakūpopamasya tavānukṛtiṃ pratipatsyate /

lg.l:
mayy eva vismaraṇadāruṇacittavṛttau
vṛttaṃ rahaḥ praṇayam apratipadyamāne /

bhedād bhruvoḥ kuṭilayor atilohitākṣyā
bhagnaṃ śarāsanam ivātiruṣā smarasya //

div.p: śaku suṣṭhu tāvad atra svacchandacāriṇī kṛtāsmi yāham asya puruvaṃśapratyayena mukhamadhor hṛdayaviṣasya hastābhyāsam upagatā /

note.p: śaku -- suṣṭhu tāvad atra svacchanda-cāriṇī kṛta āsmi ya āham asya puru-vaṃśa-pratyayena mukha-madhor hṛdaya-viṣasya hasta-abhyāsam upagatā /

div.p: śārṅgarava ittham ātmakṛtaṃ cāpalaṃ dahati /

note.p: śārṅgarava -- ittham ātma-kṛtaṃ cāpalaṃ dahati /

lg.l: ataḥ parīkṣya kartavyaṃ viśeṣāt saṃgataṃ rahaḥ /
ajñātahṛdayeṣv evaṃ vairībhavati sauhṛdam //
ataḥ parīkṣya kartavyaṃ viśeṣāt saṃgataṃ rahaḥ /
ajñāta-hṛdayeṣv evaṃ vairī-bhavati sauhṛdam //

div.p: rājā ayi bhoḥ kim atrabhavatīpratyayād evāsmān saṃyutadoṣākṣaraiḥ kṣiṇutha /

note.p: rājā -- ayi bhoḥ kim atra-bhavatī-pratyayād eva asmān saṃyuta-doṣa-akṣaraiḥ kṣiṇutha /

note.p: śārṅg --(sāsūyam) śrutaṃ bhavadbhir adhara-uttaram /

lg.l: ā janmanaḥ śāṭhyam aśikṣito yas tasyāpramāṇaṃ vacanaṃ janasya /

note.p: rājā -- bhoḥ satya-vādinn abhyupagataṃ tāvad asmābhir evam / kiṃ punar imām atisaṃdhāya labhyate /

note.p: śārad -- śārṅgarava kim uttareṇa / anuṣṭhito guroḥ saṃdeśaḥ / pratinivartāmahe vayam / (rājānaṃ prati)

dāra-tyāgī bhavāmy āho para-strī-sparśa-pāṃsulaḥ //

div.p: purohita (vicārya) yadi tāvad evaṃ kriyatām /

note.p: purohita -- (vicārya) yadi tāvad evaṃ kriyatām /

div.p: rājā anuśāstu māṃ bhavān /

note.p: rājā -- anuśāstu māṃ bhavān /

div.p: purohita atrabhavatī tavad āprasavād asmadgṛhe tiṣṭhatu / kuta idam ucyata iti cet / tvaṃ sādhubhir ādiṣṭapūrvaḥ prathamam eva cakravartinaṃ putraṃ janayiṣyasīti / sa cen munidauhitras tallakṣaṇopapanno bhaviṣyati abhinandya śuddhāntam enāṃ praveśayiṣyati / viparyaye tu pitur asyāḥ samīpanayanam avasthitam eva /

note.p: purohita -- atra-bhavatī tavad ā-prasavād asmad-gṛhe tiṣṭhatu / kuta idam ucyata iti cet / tvaṃ sādhubhir ādiṣṭa-pūrvaḥ prathamam eva cakra-vartinaṃ putraṃ janayiṣyasi iti / sa cen muni-dauhitras tal-lakṣaṇa-upapanno bhaviṣyati abhinandya śuddha-antam enāṃ praveśayiṣyati / viparyaye tu pitur asyāḥ samīpa-nayanam avasthitam eva /

div.p: rājā yathā gurubhyo rocate /

note.p: rājā -- yathā gurubhyo rocate /

div.p: purohita vatse anugaccha mām /

note.p: purohita -- vatse anugaccha mām /

div.p: śaku bhagāti vasudhe dehi me vivaram / (iti rudatī prasthitā / niṣkrāntā saha purodhasā tapasvibhiś ca)

note.p: śaku -- bhagāti vasudhe dehi me vivaram / (iti rudatī prasthitā / niṣkrāntā saha purodhasā tapasvibhiś ca)

div.p: (rājā śāpavyavahitasmṛtiḥ śakuntalāgatam eva cintayati)

note.p: (rājā śāpa-vyavahita-smṛtiḥ śakuntalā-gatam eva cintayati)

div.p: (nepathye) āścaryam āścaryam /

note.p: (nepathye) āścaryam āścaryam /

div.p: rājā (ākarṇya) kiṃ nu khalu syāt /

note.p: rājā -- (ākarṇya) kiṃ nu khalu syāt /

div.p: (praviśya) purohita (savismayam) deva adbhutaṃ khalu saṃvṛttam /

note.p: (praviśya) purohita -- (savismayam) deva adbhutaṃ khalu saṃvṛttam /

div.p: rājā kim iva /

note.p: rājā -- kim iva /

div.p: purohita deva parāvṛtteṣu kaṇvaśiṣyeṣu

note.p: purohita -- deva parāvṛtteṣu kaṇva-śiṣyeṣu --

div.p: sā nindanī svāni bhāgyāni bālā bāhūtkṣepaṃ krandituṃ ca pravṛttā /

note.p: sā nindanī svāni bhāgyāni bālā bāhu-utkṣepaṃ krandituṃ ca pravṛttā /

div.p: rājā kiṃ ca /

note.p: rājā -- kiṃ ca /
